member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Diagnostics
member.summary: Contains methods for code performance measurement.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Diagnostics.MeasureTime(System.Action)
member.summary: Executes a provided action and measures time in milliseconds that was consumed by provided action.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Diagnostics.MeasureAverageTime(System.Action{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes a provided action several times and measures average time in milliseconds that was consumed by provided action.
member.param: User specified action. The parameter is current execution count [0..executionCount-1].
Number of times to execute the specified action.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Diagnostics.CombinedWriter
member.summary: Combined console stream writer. Enables the cloning the console output.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Diagnostics.StartConsoleLogging(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Starts to clone the console output to a specified file.
If the logging is active the old instance is replaced by a new one.
member.param: True to append to an existing file, false to overwrite it.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Diagnostics.StopConsoleLogging
member.summary: Stops the logging process.

member.summary: Replaces path delimiters with specified one.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.PathExtensions.IsDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the path is file or directory.
member.returns: True if the path is directory, false if the path is file. Null is returned if the path does not exist or in case of an internal error.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.ParallelRandom.Next
member.summary:
Gets the next random number. This function encapsulates the rand.Next() function where rand is an instance of System.Random class.
Oppose to rand.Next() this function is thread safe.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.ParallelRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number within a specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue.

member.summary: Fills the provided array of bytes with random values.
